mapper.insert: insert into T_PAY_FEE_RECORDS (RECORDS_ID, PROJECT_NAME, HOUSE_CODE, CLIENT_NAME, ARREARS, PAID_IN, VOUCHER_NUMBER, INVOICE_STATUS, PAY_MANNER, COLLECTING_COMPANY, COLLECTING_ACCOUNT, INVOICE, PAY_TIME, FEE_TYPE) values (#{recordsId}, #{projectName}, #{houseCode}, #{clientName}, #{arrears}, #{paidIn}, #{voucherNumber}, #{invoiceStatus}, #{payManner}, #{collectingCompany}, #{collectingAccount}, #{invoice}, #{payTime}, #{feeType})
mapper.update: update T_PAY_FEE_RECORDS set PROJECT_NAME = #{projectName}, HOUSE_CODE = #{houseCode}, CLIENT_NAME = #{clientName}, ARREARS = #{arrears}, PAID_IN = #{paidIn}, VOUCHER_NUMBER = #{voucherNumber}, INVOICE_STATUS = #{invoiceStatus}, PAY_MANNER = #{payManner}, COLLECTING_COMPANY = #{collectingCompany}, COLLECTING_ACCOUNT = #{collectingAccount}, INVOICE = #{invoice}, PAY_TIME = #{payTime}, FEE_TYPE = #{feeType} where RECORDS_ID = #{recordsId}
mapper.select: select RECORDS_ID, PROJECT_NAME, HOUSE_CODE, CLIENT_NAME, ARREARS, PAID_IN, VOUCHER_NUMBER, INVOICE_STATUS, PAY_MANNER, COLLECTING_COMPANY, COLLECTING_ACCOUNT, INVOICE, PAY_TIME, FEE_TYPE from T_PAY_FEE_RECORDS where RECORDS_ID = #{recordsId}

select RECORDS_ID, PROJECT_NAME, HOUSE_CODE, CLIENT_NAME, ARREARS, PAID_IN, VOUCHER_NUMBER, INVOICE_STATUS, PAY_MANNER, COLLECTING_COMPANY, COLLECTING_ACCOUNT, INVOICE, PAY_TIME, FEE_TYPE from T_PAY_FEE_RECORDS
SELECT FEE_TYPE FROM T_PAY_FEE_RECORDS WHERE RECORDS_ID=#{id}
